The ggplot2 documentation can be found at <https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org>.

More details about using the package can be found in:

- [Data Visualisation chapter of 'R for Data Science' by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/data-visualisation.html)
- ['ggplot2: elegant graphics for data analysis' by Hadley Wickham](https://ggplot2-book.org/)
- ['Fundamentals of Data Visualization' by Claus O. Wilke](https://clauswilke.com/dataviz/)
